text: Sphingomonas kyungheensis is a Gram-negative, aerobic and motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas with a polar flagellum which has been isolated from soil from a ginseng field.UniProt == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas kyungheensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase kyungheensis Category:Bacteria described in 2013
title: Sphingomonas kyungheensis
